001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleLaunchingToolCall;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ProcessStartingToolCall;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ToolRunningToolCall;
006import java.io.File;
007import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
008import java.nio.file.Path;
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Optional;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014
015/** Builds named tool calls with their arguments. */
016public sealed interface ToolCall
017    permits ToolRunningToolCall, ProcessStartingToolCall, ModuleLaunchingToolCall {
018
019  String name();
020
021  List<String> arguments();
022
023  static ToolCall of(String name, Object... arguments) {
024    return ToolCall.of(null, name, arguments);
025  }
026
027  static ToolCall of(ToolFinder finder, String name, Object... arguments) {
028    return new ToolRunningToolCall(Optional.ofNullable(finder), name, new ArrayList<>())
029        .withAll(arguments);
030  }
031
032  static ToolCall java(Object... arguments) {
033    var java = Configuration.computeJavaExecutablePath("java");
034    return ToolCall.process(java, arguments);
035  }
036
037  static ToolCall process(Path executable, Object... arguments) {
038    return new ProcessStartingToolCall(executable, new ArrayList<>()).withAll(arguments);
039  }
040
041  static ToolCall module(ModuleFinder finder, String name, Object... arguments) {
042    return new ModuleLaunchingToolCall(finder, name, new ArrayList<>()).withAll(arguments);
043  }
044
045  default ToolCall with(Object argument) {
046    arguments().add(argument.toString());
047    return this;
048  }
049
050  default ToolCall with(String option, Object value, Object... more) {
051    return with(option).with(value).withAll(more);
052  }
053
054  default ToolCall with(String option, Collection<Path> paths) {
055    return with(option).with(paths, File.pathSeparator);
056  }
057
058  default ToolCall with(Collection<?> arguments, CharSequence delimiter) {
059    if (arguments.isEmpty()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Collection must not be empty");
060    return with(arguments.stream().map(Object::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(delimiter)));
061  }
062
063  default ToolCall withAll(Object... arguments) {
064    return withAll(List.of(arguments));
065  }
066
067  default ToolCall withAll(Collection<?> arguments) {
068    arguments.stream().map(Object::toString).forEach(arguments()::add);
069    return this;
070  }
071}
